<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragonblood Paragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=2387) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 39 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Strongjaw Kobold](/Heritages.aspx?ID=66) heritage, [Venomtail Kobold](/Heritages.aspx?ID=67) heritage, [Dracomancer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1280), or [Kobold Breath](/Feats.aspx?ID=1272)

</column>

---

Your draconic anatomy becomes especially pronounced. You increase the power of one of the following kobold heritages or feats you have. 

**Dracomancer** Increase the number of times you can cast each of the granted 1st- and 2nd-level innate spells by 1. 

**Kobold Breath** Creatures that critically fail their save against your Kobold Breath take 3d4 [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) of the type dealt by your draconic patron. 

**Strongjaw Kobold** Your jaws unarmed attack gains the [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) trait. 

**Venomtail Kobold** You produce enough venom to use the [Tail Toxin](/Actions.aspx?ID=540) action twice per day.
